metadata.title: CVE-2018-14332 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Clementine Music Player 1.3.1. Clementine.exe isvulnerable to a user mode write access violation due to a NULL pointerdereference in the Init call in the MoodbarPipeline::NewPadCallbackfunction in moodbar/moodbarpipeline.cpp. The vulnerability is triggeredwhen the user opens a malformed mp3 file.

criterions.comment: clementine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
